description: After the Chief gives birth, Shawn suggests she should take a break and come back in January. This references the mid-season break they had during filming, that would last until January.
The movie Shawn attemps to make Gus guess is 'Holes!' in which Dul√© Hill is a character.

The following conversation is a jab at the show itself, since this is exactly what they do for flashbacks. 
Henry: I can't believe he passed himself off as a teenager for this long
Shawn: I don't know dad, slap a wig on you, you're a spitting image of yourself when I was a kid
